name: Keyboardmania 2nd Mix
overview:
Keyboardmania 2nd Mix was produced by Konami in 2000.

In the spirit of all the other "Beatmania"-style games, this time play using a 24-key keyboard, pressing the keys in tune to the music as the bars fall to the bottom of the screen. Complete the song without missing too many of the notes, and you can play another song.

You have DJed, you have danced, but have you played the piano? Konami does it again with Keyboardmania: 2nd Mix! Just like the original, play the songs by pressing the keys as the bars fall to the bottom of the screen. Hit enough of them perfectly (or at least somewhat perfectly) and you can choose a new song to play.

Select a song, then play! As the bars fall down the screen, press the corresponding key on the 24-key keyboard.
